channel.title: Upcoming OECD Publication Embargoes and Launches
channel.description: A list of dates and publications

item.title: The effects of the EU Fit for 55 package on labour markets and the demand for skills
item.description: The effects of the EU Fit for 55 package on labour markets and the demand for skills by Centre for Skills has an embargo on Wednesday 2 August 2023 at 7:00.

item.title: Enhancing school improvement reform in New South Wales (Australia)
item.description: Enhancing school improvement reform in New South Wales (Australia) by Directorate for Education and Skills has an embargo on Wednesday 2 August 2023 at 8:00.

item.title: Institutional shareholding, common ownership and productivity - A cross-country analysis
item.description: Institutional shareholding, common ownership and productivity - A cross-country analysis by Economics Department has an embargo on Friday 4 August 2023 at 7:00.

item.title: Assessing and Anticipating Skills for the Green Transition - Unlocking Talent for a Sustainable Future
item.description: Assessing and Anticipating Skills for the Green Transition - Unlocking Talent for a Sustainable Future by Directorate for Employment, Labour and Social Affairs has an embargo on Tuesday 5 September 2023 at 9:00.
item.oe:directorate: Directorate for Employment, Labour and Social Affairs

item.title: Labour and Skills Demand in Alberta - Insights Using Big Data Intelligence
item.description: Labour and Skills Demand in Alberta - Insights Using Big Data Intelligence by Directorate for Employment, Labour and Social Affairs has an embargo on Friday 8 September 2023 at 8:00.
item.oe:directorate: Directorate for Employment, Labour and Social Affairs

item.title: OECD Corporate Governance Factbook 2023
item.description: OECD Corporate Governance Factbook 2023 by Directorate for Financial and Enterprise Affairs has an embargo on Monday 11 September 2023 at 2:30.

item.title: Education at a Glance 2023 - OECD Indicators
item.description: Education at a Glance 2023 - OECD Indicators by Directorate for Education and Skills has an embargo on Tuesday 12 September 2023 at 11:00.

item.title: Spotlight on Vocational Education and Training - Findings from Education at a Glance 2023
item.description: Spotlight on Vocational Education and Training - Findings from Education at a Glance 2023 by Directorate for Education and Skills has an embargo on Tuesday 12 September 2023 at 11:00.

item.title: Education at a Glance 2023 Sources, Methodologies and Technical Notes
item.description: Education at a Glance 2023 Sources, Methodologies and Technical Notes by Directorate for Education and Skills has an embargo on Tuesday 12 September 2023 at 11:00.

item.title: Tax Policy Reforms 2023 - OECD and Selected Partner Economies
item.description: Tax Policy Reforms 2023 - OECD and Selected Partner Economies by Centre for Tax Policy and Administration has an embargo on Wednesday 13 September 2023 at 11:00.
item.oe:directorate: Centre for Tax Policy and Administration

item.title: Methodological Guidelines for Environmentally Related Tax Revenue Accounts
item.description: Methodological Guidelines for Environmentally Related Tax Revenue Accounts by Environment Directorate has an embargo on Friday 15 September 2023 at 0:00.

item.title: Policies for the Future of Farming and Food in the European Union
item.description: Policies for the Future of Farming and Food in the European Union by Trade and Agriculture Directorate has an embargo on Wednesday 27 September 2023 at 10:00.

item.description: Big Data Intelligence on Skills Demand and Training in Umbria by Directorate for Employment, Labour and Social Affairs has an embargo on Sunday 1 October 2023 at 8:00.

item.description: Economic Policy Reforms 2023 - Going for Growth by Economics Department has an embargo on Tuesday 3 October 2023 at 12:00.
